response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Given its worth to both of us, I propose a transaction price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate, while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful business relationship. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 950000}
